All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AssociateBagCard
Class responsible for populating Associate Bag prompt.
AuthRequest
This class combines authentication and fetching user information from Lobby Service.
AuthUtils
This class provides methods to create authorization headers for requests.
BonusChoiceAbstract
Abstract class representing the basics of token Acquiring, used for code reuse.
BonusType
Enum class which contains all the token bonus Types that can be taken directly from the bank.
BuyCardByCard
A class responsible for populating Buy sacrifice card prompt.
BuyCardPrompt
A class responsible for populating Buy card prompt.
BuyCardPrompt.BankType
An enum of the possible bank types in a card purchase.
BuyCardPrompt.ButtonType
An enum of the possible button types in a card purchase.
BuyingBagCard
A class responsible for populating Buy bag card prompt.
BuyingReserved
A class responsible for populating Buy reserved card prompt.
BuyReserveNobleCard
A class responsible for populating Buy reserved noble card prompt.
CardComponent
FXGL component for development cards on board.
ChangeColourRequest
This class provides methods to change the colour of the user.
ChangePasswordRequest
This class provides methods to change the password of the user.
ChoicePromptAbstract
TokenAcquiringTwo but renamed for the purpose of code reuse.
ChooseNoble
Class responsible for populating Noble Conflict prompt.
ChooseNobleReserve
Class responsible for populating Reserving Noble prompt.
Config
This class contains configuration options for the game.
CreateGameServiceRequest
This class provides methods to create a game service in Lobby Service.
CreateSessionRequest
This class provides methods to create a session in Lobby Service.
CurrencyType
An enum of the possible currency types in a card purchase.
DeckFactory
Player's deck factory.
DeleteSessionRequest
This class provides methods to delete a session in Lobby Service.
Dropdown
sample class plz don't remove.
EntityType
Separates the entities by type.
GameFactory
FXGL factory for the game board.
GameParams
This class contains information about session game parameters in Lobby Service.
GameRequest
This class provides methods to perform development card related requests to the game server.
GameScreen
GameScreen class spawns all the entities for game board.
GetUserRequest
This class provides methods to get details about a user in Lobby Service.
JoinSessionRequest
This class provides methods to join a session in Lobby Service.
LaunchSessionRequest
This class provides methods to launch a session in Lobby Service.
LeaveSessionRequest
This class provides methods to leave a session in Lobby Service.
Level
Enum for three levels of cards in Decks.
ListSessionsRequest
This class provides methods to list sessions in Lobby Service.
LobbyFactory
This class is used to create the entities of the lobby screen.
LobbyFactory.Type
Enum of possible entities in the lobby screen.
LobbyScreen
This class controls the entities of the lobby screen.
LogoutRequest
This class provides methods to log out the user.
MainApp
FXGL Game Application, Game's entry point.
MainMenuScreen
UI Screen Main Menu Screen after logging in.
MainMenuScreenUiController
UI Controller for Main Menu Screen.
NobleChoiceAbstract
Abstract class representing the basics of Noble choice.
NobleComponent
FXGL component for noble tiles on board.
OpenPrompt
Class containing 2 methods to open prompts.
Pause
Class for getting access to the in-game quick menu.
Pause.ButtonType
An enum for the possible buttons in the quick menu.
PlayerDecks
Player decks.
PriceMap
Holds the token price for a development card.
PromptComponent
FXGL Component for prompts, used for Prompt entity.
PromptFactory
FXGL factory for Prompts.
PromptsRequests
Class responsible for sending HTTP requests related to the prompts.
PromptTypeInterface
Interface to implement for prompts, contains an enum of all the possible prompt types as well (add the new type to the enum and enum map for it to be usable).
PromptTypeInterface.PromptType
Enum of all the possible types of prompts.
PurchaseMap
Class responsible for representing the gems the player decided to put down to buy a card.
RequestClient
This class provides an HTTP client to send requests to the backend/Lobby Service.
RoleRequest
This class provides methods to get the role of the user.
RulebookScreen
UI Screen for local client settings.
RulebookScreenUiController
UI Controller for rulebook screen.
SeeCards
Class responsible for populating See Cards prompt.
SeeOtherReserved
A class responsible for populating See Other reserved Cards prompt.
SeeOwnReserved
A class responsible for populating See Own reserved Cards prompt.
SeeReservedAbstract
An abstract class responsible for populating See reserved Cards prompt, for code reuse.
Session
This class contains information about a session in Lobby Service.
SessionDetailsRequest
This class provides methods to get details about a session in Lobby Service.
SettingsScreen
UI Screen for local client settings.
SettingsScreenUiController
UI Controller for local settings screen.
SplendorEvents
A class of some Custom Events used mainly for prompts and game.
StartupScreen
The Startup Screen is the first screen the user sees after launching the MainApp.
StartupScreenFactory
The StartupScreenFactory contains all entities and methods related to the startup screen and the login screen.
TokenAcquiring
Class for Acquiring Tokens Choice: 2 tokens of the same color or 3 differently colored tokens.
TokenAcquiringThree
Class responsible for populating Acquiring 2 tokens prompt.
TokenAcquiringTwo
Class responsible for populating Acquiring 2 tokens prompt.
TokenRequest
This class provides methods to log in the user and get the associated OAuth tokens.
TokensInfo
This class contains information about OAuth user tokens.
UpdateGameInfo
Class with a bunch of methods to update various game information.
UrlUtils
Utility class for performing operations on URLs.
User
This class contains information about a user in Lobby Service.
